webInfo.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT promotion.promotionid AS ID, promotion.institute AS Institut, promotion.promoprogramm AS promoprogramm, promotion.promoprogrammdetail AS promoprogrammdetail, promotion.framework AS framework, promotion.frameworkdetail AS frameworkdetail, promotion.field AS field, promotion.gradid AS AkadGradID, promotion.title as Titel, promotion.zeitstempel AS Zeitstempel, promotion.mtknr AS MtkNr, '' AS StatusID, '' AS StatusTxt, '' AS StatusProzessID, promotion.einrichtungid AS EinrichtungID FROM promotion WHERE promotion.mtknr = [sos.mtknr]
SELECT promotion.mentor1id AS MentorID1, promotion.mentor2id AS MentorID2, promotion.mentor3id AS MentorID3, mentor1name, mentor1einrich, mentor2name, mentor2einrich, mentor3name, mentor3einrich, evaluator1id, evaluator2id, evaluator3id, evaluator4id FROM promotion WHERE promotion.promotionid = [ID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, '1' AS Nr, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [evaluator1id]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, '2' AS Nr, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [evaluator2id]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, '3' AS Nr, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [evaluator3id]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, '4' AS Nr, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [evaluator4id]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [MentorID1]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [MentorID2]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [MentorID3]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT ltxt AS AkadGrad, ktxt AS AkadGradKurz FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT promotion.applicationOfAssumption AS applicationOfAssumption, promotion.assumptionCommitee AS assumptionCommitee, promotion.applicationOfAdmission AS applicationOfAdmission, promotion.openingOfProcedure AS openingOfProcedure, promotion.forwardingOfFile AS forwardingOfFile, promotion.forwardingForCommitee AS forwardingForCommitee, promotion.dateOfColloquium AS dateOfColloquium, promotion.dateOfPublishing AS dateOfPublishing, promotion.handoverToLibrary AS handoverToLibrary, promotion.dateForCertificate AS dateForCertificate, promotion.fileToArchive AS fileToArchive, promotion.archiveNumber AS archiveNumber FROM promotion WHERE promotion.promotionid=[ID]
SELECT DISTINCT r_kommission.name AS name, k_kommissionstype.ltxt AS kommType, k_kommissionstype.sort AS sort FROM r_kommission JOIN k_kommissionstype ON (r_kommission.k_kommtype_id=k_kommissionstype.id) WHERE r_kommission.promotion_id=[ID] ORDER BY k_kommissionstype.sort
SELECT k_akadgrad.ltxt AS bez, k_akadgrad.dtxt AS kurz, r_personal_akadgrad.sonst, r_personal_akadgrad.date, r_personal_akadgrad.place, r_personal_akadgrad.isappliedsience FROM r_personal_akadgrad JOIN promotion ON (r_personal_akadgrad.bid=promotion.bid) JOIN k_akadgrad ON (r_personal_akadgrad.gradid=k_akadgrad.gradid) WHERE promotion.promotionid=[ID] ORDER BY date
SELECT DISTINCT v_sos.mtknr AS PerID, v_sos.res12 AS PerAkaVor, v_sos.res5 AS gradfh, v_sos.vorname AS PerVor, v_sos.nachname AS PerNac, v_sos.geschl AS Geschl, v_sos.mtknr AS MtkNr, v_sos.res11 As PersonalStatus, v_sos.res13 AS AppStatusID, v_sos.gebdat AS GebDat, v_sos.gebort AS GebOrt, v_sos.gebland AS GebLandID, v_sos.staat AS NationID FROM v_sos WHERE v_sos.mtknr = [MtkNr]
SELECT v_k_akfz.akfz, v_k_akfz.dtxt AS dtxt FROM v_k_akfz
SELECT v_k_akfz.akfz, v_k_akfz.dtxt AS dtxt FROM v_k_akfz
SELECT k_akadgrad.gradid, k_akadgrad.dtxt AS dtxt FROM k_akadgrad
SELECT k_perstatus.perstatusid, k_perstatus.dtxt As PerStatus FROM k_perstatus
SELECT k_perstatus.perstatusid, k_perstatus.ktxt AS PerStatus FROM k_perstatus
SELECT k_applicantstatus.applicantstatusid, k_applicantstatus.dtxt As PerStatus FROM k_applicantstatus
SELECT DISTINCT v_anschri.anschrinr AS KontID, v_anschri.plz As PLZ, v_anschri.ort As Ort, v_anschri.strasse As Strasse, v_anschri.tel As Telefon, v_anschri.fax As Fax, v_anschri.email As eMail, v_sos.mtknr AS PerID FROM v_anschri, v_sos WHERE v_sos.mtknr = v_anschri.mtknr AND v_anschri.anschrkz = 'H' AND v_anschri.mtknr = [PerID]
SELECT blobs.txt AS Mahnung FROM blobs, r_blob WHERE blobs.blobid = r_blob.blobid AND r_blob.tabelle = 'drucktexte' AND r_blob.tabpk = [EinrichtungID] AND r_blob.spalte='mahnung'
SELECT protobjs.tabelle AS Object, protobjs.tabpk AS PromoId, max(protobjs.zeitstempel) AS MaxTime,protentry.actionsuppl AS Description FROM protobjs,protentry,blobs WHERE protobjs.protid=protentry.protid AND protentry.blobid=blobs.blobid AND protentry.action='print' AND tabpk=[ID] GROUP BY Object,PromoId,Description ORDER BY Object

applicationSearchList.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT bewerber.bid AS ID, bewerber.vorname AS Vorname, bewerber.nachname AS Nachname, bewerber.mtknr AS MtkNr, bewerber.geschl AS Geschl, bewerber.applicantstatusid AS StatusID, bewerber.gebdat AS GebDat, bewerber.gebort AS GebOrt, bewerber.gebland AS GebLand, bewerber.staat AS Nationalitaet, promotion.promoprogramm AS Programm, promotion.promoprogrammdetail AS ProgrammDetail, promotion.frameworkdetail AS FrameworkDetail, promotion.framework AS Framework, promotion.gradid AS GradID, promotion.title AS Titel, promotion.institute AS Institut, promotion.einrichtungid AS eID, promotion.startofdoctoralstudies AS Start, promotion.promotionid AS pID, promotion.k_abstgv_id AS StgID, mentor1name, mentor1einrich, mentor2name, mentor2einrich, mentor3name, mentor3einrich FROM [(...)] (bewerber LEFT JOIN promotion ON (bewerber.bid=promotion.bid)) [FROM] WHERE promotion.bid IS NOT NULL AND promotion.mtknr IS NULL [where] ORDER BY [orderby]
promo SELECT strasse, plz, ort, land, email, telefon FROM kontakt WHERE tabelle='bewerber' AND typadrid=0 AND tabpk=[bewerber.bid]
SELECT id,gradid,sonst,date,place,isappliedsience FROM r_personal_akadgrad WHERE bid = [ID] ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGrad FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [gradid]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGrad FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [GradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS Einrichtung FROM einrichtung WHERE id = [eID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS Status FROM k_applicantstatus WHERE applicantstatusid = [StatusID]

webInfoList.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT promotion.promotionid AS ID, promotion.institute AS Institut, promotion.promoprogramm AS promoprogramm, promotion.promoprogrammdetail AS promoprogrammdetail, promotion.framework AS framework, promotion.frameworkdetail AS frameworkdetail, promotion.field AS field, promotion.gradid AS AkadGradID,promotion.forwardingoffile AS AkteFsk, promotion.openingofprocedure AS eroeffnung, promotion.title as Titel, promotion.applicationofassumption AS Antrag, promotion.assumptioncommitee AS Annahme, promotion.handovertolibrary AS Abgabe, promotion.mentor1id AS MentorID1, dateofcolloquium AS colloquium, promotion.mentor2id AS MentorID2, promotion.einrichtungID AS EinrichtungID, promotion.mtknr AS pID, v_sos.nachname AS nachname, v_sos.vorname AS vorname, v_sos.gebdat AS GebDat, promotion.zeitstempel AS Zeitstempel, promotion.mtknr AS PersonID, '' AS StatusID, '' AS StatusTxt, '' AS StatusProzessID, v_anschri.strasse AS Strasse, v_anschri.zusatz AS Zusatz, v_anschri.plz AS PLZ, v_anschri.ort AS Ort, v_anschri.tel AS Telefon, v_anschri.email AS Email, promotion.mentor1id AS Mentor1, promotion.mentor2id AS Mentor2, promotion.mentor3id AS Mentor3 FROM [(...] ((promotion JOIN v_sos ON (promotion.mtknr=v_sos.mtknr)) LEFT JOIN v_anschri ON (promotion.mtknr=v_anschri.mtknr AND v_anschri.anschrkz='H')) [from] WHERE 1=1 [where] ORDER BY [orderby]
SELECT DISTINCT bewertung_id AS GesNote FROM bewertungsart,gratings WHERE bewertungsart.id=gratings.bewertungsart_id AND gratings.promotion_id = [ID] AND bewertungsart.key='note'
SELECT DISTINCT bewertung.dtxt AS GesPr FROM bewertungsart,gratings,bewertung WHERE bewertungsart.id=gratings.bewertungsart_id AND gratings.bewertung_id=bewertung.id AND gratings.promotion_id = [ID] AND bewertungsart.key='ges'
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGrad FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, vorname, nachname, geschl, titelid, gradid FROM personal WHERE pid = [Mentor1]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGrad FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [gradid]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [titelid]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, vorname, nachname, geschl, titelid, gradid FROM personal WHERE pid = [Mentor2]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGrad FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [gradid]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [titelid]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, vorname, nachname, geschl, titelid, gradid FROM personal WHERE pid = [Mentor3]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGrad FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [gradid]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [titelid]

promoAntrag.Transform.SQL:
SELECT count(*) FROM promotion
SELECT id, ltxt,ktxt FROM einrichtung WHERE kostenst IS NOT NULL ORDER BY inst_nr
SELECT akfz, dtxt FROM v_k_akfz WHERE aikz='A' AND akfz!='ZZZ' ORDER BY dtxt
SELECT gradid, dtxt, ltxt, sort FROM k_akadgrad WHERE aikz='A' AND forpromotion='J' ORDER BY sort,dtxt

promoAntragPrint.Transform.SQL:
SELECT count(*) FROM promotion
SELECT id, ltxt,ktxt,farbe FROM einrichtung WHERE kostenst IS NOT NULL ORDER BY inst_nr
SELECT gradid, dtxt, ltxt, sort FROM k_akadgrad WHERE aikz='A' AND forpromotion='J' ORDER BY sort,dtxt
SELECT '[language]' AS language, '[fak]' AS fak, '[inst]' AS inst, '[name]' AS name, '[vorname]' AS vorname, '[gender]' AS gender, '[gebDate]' AS gebDate, '[gebOrt]' AS gebOrt, '[gebLand]' AS gebLand, '[national]' AS national, '[street]' AS street, '[plz]' AS plz, '[ort]' AS ort, '[land]' AS land, '[tel]' AS tel, '[email]' AS email, '[appStatus]' AS appStatus, '[stat4Add]' AS stat4Add, '[stat5Add]' AS stat5Add, '[prog]' AS prog, '[progAdd]' AS progAdd, '[binat]' AS binat, '[binatAdd]' AS binatAdd, '[grad1]' AS grad1, '[grad1wann]' AS grad1wann, '[grad1wo]' AS grad1wo, '[grad1FH]' AS grad1FH, '[grad2]' AS grad2, '[grad2wann]' AS grad2wann, '[grad2wo]' AS grad2wo, '[grad2FH]' AS grad2FH, '[grad3]' AS grad3, '[grad3wann]' AS grad3wann, '[grad3wo]' AS grad3wo, '[grad3FH]' AS grad3FH, '[gebiet]' AS gebiet, '[gettingGrad]' AS gettingGrad, '[title]' AS title, '[begin]' AS begin, '[mentor1]' AS mentor1, '[mentor1Inst]' AS mentor1Inst, '[mentor2]' AS mentor2, '[mentor2Inst]' AS mentor2Inst, '[mentor3]' AS mentor3, '[mentor3Inst]' AS mentor3Inst

printApplication.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT bid, vorname, nachname, mtknr, geschl, applicantstatusid, gebdat, gebort, gebland, staat FROM bewerber WHERE bid = [bewerber.bid]
SELECT DISTINCT v_k_akfz.dtxt AS Geburtsland FROM v_k_akfz WHERE v_k_akfz.akfz=[gebland]
SELECT DISTINCT v_k_akfz.dtxt AS Nationality FROM v_k_akfz WHERE v_k_akfz.akfz=[staat]
SELECT DISTINCT strasse, ort, plz, land, email, telefon FROM kontakt WHERE tabelle='bewerber' AND tabpk=[bid]
SELECT DISTINCT v_k_akfz.dtxt AS Land FROM v_k_akfz WHERE v_k_akfz.akfz=[land]
SELECT DISTINCT employment.aikz AS empAktiv, employment.name AS empName, employment.job, strasse, ort, plz, land, email, telefon FROM kontakt,employment WHERE kontakt.typadrid = 1 AND kontakt.tabpk = employment.id AND kontakt.tabelle='employment' AND employment.bid=[bid]
SELECT DISTINCT v_k_akfz.dtxt AS Land FROM v_k_akfz WHERE v_k_akfz.akfz=[land]
SELECT DISTINCT gradid, date, place, isappliedsience FROM r_personal_akadgrad WHERE bid=[bid] ORDER BY date
SELECT DISTINCT ltxt AS AkadGrad FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid=[gradid]
SELECT DISTINCT promoprogramm, promoprogrammdetail, framework, frameworkdetail, gradid, title, institute, einrichtungid, k_abstgv_id, startofdoctoralstudies, mentor1name, mentor1einrich, mentor2name, mentor2einrich, mentor3name, mentor3einrich FROM promotion WHERE bid=[bid]
SELECT DISTINCT ltxt AS Einrichtung FROM einrichtung WHERE id=[einrichtungid]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS Fach FROM v_k_abstgv WHERE abstgvnr=[k_abstgv_id]
SELECT id, ltxt,ktxt,farbe FROM einrichtung WHERE kostenst IS NOT NULL ORDER BY inst_nr
SELECT gradid, dtxt, ltxt, sort FROM k_akadgrad WHERE aikz='A' AND forpromotion='J' ORDER BY sort,dtxt
